name: Preston Peak
shortBio: Creating music that bridges concert halls and gaming worlds.
fullBio: Preston Peak is a post-classical composer whose work spans the worlds of concert music and video game soundtracks. His compositions blend traditional classical forms with contemporary sensibilities, creating music that resonates with both classical music enthusiasts and modern audiences.

With a background in classical piano and composition, Preston brings a unique perspective to game music, infusing it with the depth and sophistication of art music while maintaining the energy and accessibility that games demand.
His concert works have been performed at venues across the country, while his game music packs have been downloaded by thousands of indie developers worldwide.
